column2: ggplot(data=lmData.out, aes(x=stats::reorder(biomarkerName, beta), y=beta, ymin=lower95, ymax=higher95)) +
geom_hline(yintercept=0, lty=2) +  # add a dotted line at x=0 after flip
coord_flip() +  # flip coordinates (puts labels on y axis)
ylab("SD change in lipoprotein hydrolyzability capacity (determined \n by ITC) per 1-SD increase in x-variable concentration") +
